website_summaries.verdict: Users love this copter's sensitive controls and acrobatic ability, and it comes with everything you need to start flying immediately.
pros: Panic button allows you to quickly bring the helicopter back to a level altitude
Designed to work for beginners as well as those with advanced flying skills
Can stand up to some dings and crashes
cons: Some users report that the instructions are confusing for beginners

customer_reviews.title: Great flyng heli
customer_reviews.text: Very stable flying this heli. The gyro keeps it flying smooth through the air and in windy conditions. If you are a beginner, do not click the top left toggle switch into idle up. Idle up takes it off the gyro. Keep the toggle clicked full forward to have gyro assist. It does what you want it to do. I have two, and have yet to crash one.
customer_reviews.author: DLO

customer_reviews.title: This is a great model and probably the best for beginners with patience
customer_reviews.text: This model is great, probably the best for it's class, although I have limited experience with many different models. If you have a fair/small bit of coax experience, you can do this, just go slow to get your head-right and wait for good weather days with no or slight wind. Work on a smooth surface and ease the machine light on the skids and get eye, hand coordination good. Stick with doing that and you may be a dozen battery charge cycles in before you are in the air a bit, but if you have patience, you can learn without a crash. Really is a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: gbic3

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable, fun little Heli
customer_reviews.text: If you’re an old Heli pilot that’s built their own helis and know how to actually fly a heli, this is fun, easy and stable. My very first heli was a BladeCP. I quickly realized I had no idea what I was doing. Several years later and many hours of sims and flying 450s 500 batter and 50 size nitro, things were much different. I bought this Heli on a whim to see if I would “get back into it” its fun to fly and surprisingly durable(I had a hard, throttle cut landing on pavement when flying it at night with minimal lighting, goofing off). To my surprise nothing was damaged!
customer_reviews.author: William B Linton

customer_reviews.title: Nice stable helicopter
customer_reviews.text: Like-Stable in the lowest mode, Good for 3d acrobatics in high mode. Parts are relatively cheap if you crash and you will!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I really like this heli
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it flies great is sensitive and responsive and 3D flies amazing. Just be careful even with the brushless motors and carbon fiber prop upgrades, it is under powered, which isnt a problem If you are aware and compensate.
customer_reviews.author: David Cantor

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I sent the old one back, and am awaiting the 2nd replacement to come in. Overall it came in great condition, it flew great for the first two flights or so (swash was very level out of the box, etc) then the tail motor randomly failed mid-air and caused a horrible crash. The tail motor had/has completely failed in the span of the day after I received it. I am an experienced pilot and have a Goblin 570, Blade Fusion 360, Blade Nano S2 and none of these have ever had these issues. This is my first "bigger" motor driven tail though, so I'm guessing it's just a fluke. We'll see when the new one arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Lyric

customer_reviews.title: Gentle  flyer
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion the heli is for beginners and intermediate flyers. The helicopter flies great of the box. I have flown the heli at least a dozen times without issues. One thing that can get annoying is that every time you fly it and want to charge the battery. You have to take the canopy off to charge the battery or replace it with a charged one. Lastly this heli falls more in the 150$-200$ range. Reason is priced in the range that is, due to HH parts availability in local hobby stores. Note:This RC Helicopter falls under the FAA Recreational Flyers & Modeler ,before flying register with the FAA and download the app B4UFLY. (Google rc faa)
customer_reviews.author: Don Hector

customer_reviews.title: super easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: this product features a safe mode which makes it very easy to fly even for a beginner. If you've ever wanted to fly a helicopter this is the one to start with and to stay with. Once you have mastered the safe mode for beginners this is a true 3D helicopter. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Droluk

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Broke first time I used it. Just spun around in a circle and slammed into concrete. Replacement (free) elevated, then spun out of control, dropped to the ground and broke. "Fool me once shame on you. Fool me twice shame on me." I highly recommend you do NOT purchase this item!!!!!!!!! Should note: they replaced the first one with no problem. We'll see about the second one.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Wexler

customer_reviews.title: Start with a fixed pitch heli
customer_reviews.text: Great heli. I had one and crashed it, then bought the 200S and spent time flying that. Much happier to go back up after that and some simulator time.
customer_reviews.author: azviewer39586

customer_reviews.title: Great confidence building helicopter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get back into RC heli flying. The SAFE mode took a little while to get accustomed to but now that I'm quick with it it has safe my heli a few times now. I would recommend this as a great way to progess with a collective pitch machine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Stable and responsive
customer_reviews.text: Flies great,and spare parts can be purchased in case of an accident.Great heli to learn tricks or just fly around. Customer support is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Baker

customer_reviews.title: broke while trying to take the cover off - never got to use the helicopter
customer_reviews.text: i realize it has to be light-weight, but the shell is waaaaaaaay tooooooo fragile
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Parts are available and looks easy to fix. Stables flyer!
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for fun!
customer_reviews.text: This rtf package came with everything needed to go right in the box. Includes a battery ( recommend you buy extra ), charger, AA batteries for transmitter, and pre-programmed dxe transmitter. Most fun in a box you can buy for $300.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helicopter
customer_reviews.text: Great quality helicopter. Easy to use for a beginner. Has advanced capability for more experienced pilots. Very glad with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dvquadman

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool you can grow into and prepare you for more complex helicopters
customer_reviews.text: Anyone starting out in RC Helicopters needs this one. Do not get me wrong, it is not for beginners only. This helicopter can do a lot of the distance and will fly like any other helicopter without the smart technology. However in beginner mode you don’t have to worry about wrecking it.
customer_reviews.author: osvaldo

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I like helicopters more than drones simply because I find them easierto control. Also I paid almost $350.00 for this helicopter and the battery will not take a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really loving the new copter
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter is super cool does everything you ask of it.. and super fast and it's not a beginner's helicopter. But it's a whole lot of fun though
customer_reviews.author: BIG. L

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Instantly broke when it got six inches off the ground
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great Helicopter ease of use is amazing I highly recommend this helicopter 4 a beginner or novice it's a great super fun helicopter
customer_reviews.author: Evan Hughes

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Heli
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that the body and main rotor head are fragile. If crashed at all, they may need replaced... unlike the nano and sub-micro size copters which usually crash many times without requiring replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Beginner helicopter. Guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Helicopter. Especially Beginners who want a bigger Heli than a micro. SAFE mode on this, is awesome. Will help you gradually increase you skills on collective pitch from a switch of a button. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Julian J

customer_reviews.title: No support for binding to any DX computer transmitters. No download no nada
customer_reviews.text: You must manually program every function for this heli due to lack of support from Horizon Hobby and spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bird!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect! My batteries and controllers synced up no problem and was flying within 20min of opening the box!
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality, very responsive 3D Heli!
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as advertised, good tech support. This reminds me you usually get what you pay for!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeffery Willard

customer_reviews.title: this thing can take some pretty rough crashes without damage
customer_reviews.text: very durable, low maintenance, easy to fix. im very happy with mine
customer_reviews.author: Discardedyouth

customer_reviews.title: First collective pitch helo
customer_reviews.text: Took the step and got this RTF helicopter. Love it, well built and parts are easy to get.
customer_reviews.author: Craig K.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first collective pitch rc heli and I gotta say it's quite a stable and easy to learn heli, not as puny as the micro helis but nowhere near as daunting as the larger more expensive helis. If you crash hard it will break but Parts are cheap and plentiful and easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rigley

product_meta.title: Blade 230 S V2 RTF RC Helicopter: Brushless CP Heli | 2.4GHz DXe Tx/Rx Radio System with SAFE Technology |3S LiPo Battery and Charger, Orange - BLH1400
product_meta.description:
Style:RTF Ready-to-Fly

COLLECTIVE PITCH CONFIDENCE!
> For those looking to hone their skills on a collective pitch machine, the Blade 230 S V2 takes the flight experience to the next level. Building off the widely popular platform, this new version adds key improvements geared at growing pilot skills.

The new ESC gives even more impressive flight stability and heading hold, creating a clean, confidence inspiring flight experience. Additionally, the newly tuned Spektrum AR636 with aluminum bottom case and improved damping makes this heli feel like a whole new machine in the air. A reinforced frame and main gear along with metal gear servos and ABS main blades can survive the learning curve and add confidence.

Engineered around the abilities of innovative SAFE technology, its progressive flight mode system makes flying a collective pitch heli more comfortable, even if it's your first collective pitch helicopter. The flight and strength improvements make this a blast to fly in your local park or backyard.

SAFE TECHNOLOGY
Innovative SAFE Technology makes it easy for anyone to fly helicopters with confidence. Flight modes from self-leveling to full 3D allow you to grow your skills with this helicopter, from beginner and intermediate, to advanced maneuvers.

PROGRESSIVE FLIGHT MODES
 * Stability Mode-Limited flight envelope with self-leveling a bank angle limit
 * Agility Mode - Full control for sport aerobatics with no bank angle limit
 * 3D Mode - Turns up the flip and roll rate for 3D capability

KEY FEATURES:
 * Panic Recovery quickly returns to level flight with the press of a button
 * Updated ESC delivers vastly improved performance, reliability, and tail hold
 * Updated, robust Main Gear provides greater durability in the event of a crash
 * High-speed, metal-gear, cyclic digital servos offer precise, high-performance control
 * Collective Pitch Rotor System engineered to provide the right level of maneuverability for learning aerobatics and inverted flight
 * Impact-resistant ABS main blades and newly reinforced tough composite airframe and tail rotor
 * High-speed brushless main and tail motors work together to deliver a simplified drive system that makes the 230 S V2 light weight and responsive
 * Vivid, high-visibility canopy - and bright main blades and tail - make it easy to maintain orientation

RTF (READY TO FLY)
Ready-to-Fly means everything you need is already included in the box - there is nothing extra to buy!


INCLUDES:

 * Blade 230 S V2 RTF
 * Spektrum AR636 Receiver
 * Spektrum DXe Transmitter with DSMX 2.4GHz Technology
 * H3050 Micro Cyclic Servo (3)
 * Brushless ES
 * 3900Kv Brushless Moto
 * E-flite 800mAh 3S Li-Po Flight Battery and Charger
 * User Manual

SPECIFICATIONS:
 * Skill Level: Level 2
 * Channels: 6
 * Flying Weight: 11.96 oz (339g)
 * Height: 46 inches (164mm)
 * Length: 66 inches (474mm)
 * Main Rotor Blade Length: 9.25 inches (235mm)
 * Main Rotor Diameter: 21.10 inches (536mm)
 * Main Rotor Head Type: Collective Pitch (CCPM) Flybarless
 * Swashplate Type: 120 degree CCPM
 * Tail Drive: Direct Drive
 * Tail Rotor Diameter: 3.25 inches (82.5mm)
 * Width: 54 inches (90mm)
feature_bullets: Fully assembled collective pitch RC helicopter with tough composite airframe
Provides RC pilots looking to hone their skills the right level of maneuverability for learning aerobatics and inverted flight
SAFE technology's progressive flight mode system allows you to grow your skills- from beginner & intermediate, to advanced maneuvers
Panic recovery mode brings the heli back to a level attitude at the push of a button
Ready-to-Fly (RTF) version includes everything you need - right in the box
